title: Suggestion: Add something to new champ select - Roles in Demand
body:
Curious to see what others think. Queue times are fairly annoying at the moment, if there was some sort of indicator for what roles are required to fill teams / which roles have the lowest estimated queue times that would be pretty great. 

I personally shy away from going fill, due to being ok at only a couple of champs in JG and Supp, meaning if they are picked or banned then I am in a bit of trouble. This way I can choose between the other three roles and minimise queue times by picking the ones that are needed most to fill teams.

What does everyone else think of this?

replies.body: While this is good, it will basically be "We need supports" and "Quit trying to get mid lane, everyone else want's it."
